author: aandvalenzuela
body:
Testing if ROOT fix provided at https://github.com/root-project/root/pull/13267 solves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8590.
Patch applied on top of the ROOT update (https://github.com/cms-sw/root/commits/cms/master/d2ac936296).
title: [Do not merge] Test ROOT fix for TH2Poly class (ROOT PR #13267)
